name: Sumo Marketing Website
description: A visual-heavy, conversion-optimized marketing website for Sumo, a restaurant management SaaS. Targets cafe/chain owners/managers with AI analytics, inventory tracking, and SumoBot demos. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and Framer Motion. Emphasizes 70% visuals (dashboard screenshots, 30-60s animated explainers), multilingual stubs (next-intl), and SEO/ad support.

codeGeneration.componentStyle: Extend shadcn/ui components (e.g., button.tsx, card.tsx) with Framer Motion animations (e.g., hover scale, fade transitions). Use Tailwind for styling. Ensure reusability with typed props (e.g., VisualProps: { src: string; alt: string; isInteractive?: boolean }).
codeGeneration.namingConvention: PascalCase for components (e.g., FeatureCard.tsx), kebab-case for files/folders (e.g., src/app/features/inventory/page.tsx).
codeGeneration.fileStructure: Follow src/app for pages (e.g., page.tsx, features/inventory/page.tsx), src/components for reusable components (e.g., landing/HeroSection.tsx, features/FeatureCard.tsx).
codeGeneration.visuals: Integrate 70% visual content: web-sourced images (Unsplash/Pexels for cafes/chains), dashboard screenshots, 30-60s Framer Motion-animated explainer videos. Add alt texts with SEO keywords (e.g., 'AI inventory dashboard for restaurant management').
codeGeneration.conversions: Embed CTAs in all components (e.g., TrialSignupForm.tsx, DemoRequestForm.tsx). Prioritize trial sign-ups and demo bookings with empowering copy (e.g., 'Ditch outdated software—Sumo’s AI tracks everything'). Track form submits via GA4.

contentGeneration.tone: Empowering, relatable, professional. Target frustrated cafe/chain owners/managers upgrading from outdated software.
contentGeneration.copyGuidelines: Highlight AI analytics, inventory tracking, SumoBot. Use benefit-driven headlines (e.g., 'Cut waste by 25% with intelligent tracking'). Include 3 generated case studies (e.g., 'Cafe Bloom: 40% faster POs'). Gate 30% content (e.g., GRN guide PDF).
contentGeneration.seo: Incorporate keywords: 'restaurant inventory management', 'AI restaurant tracking', 'purchase order software', 'franchise outlet management'. Add meta/OG tags, schema (VideoObject for explainers).

aiInstructions.multilingual: Use next-intl for English/Spanish stubs. Add hreflang tags for SEO. Ensure i18n-ready components (e.g., LanguageSelector.tsx).

integrations.demoLinks: Embed SaaS demo iframes in DemoRequestForm.tsx and /contact/demo/page.tsx.
integrations.analytics: Track form submissions and video views via GA4 events. Use Hotjar for heatmap insights on interactive demos.
